spatial_accuracy.notes: General layout and room placement correspond to the floor plan. However, door swing directions are inconsistent with the 2D plan, and there is a significant discrepancy in the living room wall alignment. Window placement in the living area and bedrooms deviates slightly from the source schematics.

structural_fidelity.notes: The model correctly utilizes a cutaway view with no roof and a dark neutral background. However, a hallucinated room was added in the top-left corner (far west), which does not exist in the source 2D floor plan. All text and UI elements were successfully excluded.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture mapping is mostly accurate including the kitchen block, dining table, and bedroom sets. Minor scale distortions are present in the living room seating area compared to the 2D plan.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Excellent adherence to the low-poly, flat-shaded aesthetic. The isometric orthographic camera angle is precise. No textures or photorealistic elements are present.

detected_errors.description: Hallucinated additional room in the top-left (North-West) corner not found in the 2D floor plan.
Door swing orientations in several rooms do not match the source 2D layout.
Wall misalignment in the central living area compared to the rigid L-shape in the floor plan.
